song_lyrics: Māre āngaṇ sonāno sūraj ūgiyo re lol,
Relyā kaī tej harakh ūbharyo re lol...
Joyā Shrījī sākshāt Pramukh santmā re lol,
Shāne bandhāu have tantmā re lol... 1
Kaīk janmonu puṇya āj pāngaryu re lol,
Nāṇu Harivarnu hāth lāgiyu re lol;
Me to sarvoparī Shyāmnī chuḍī grahī re lol,
Parbhavnī prīt ḍolariyo varī re lol... 2
Vajra dhartīmā vajra khīlḍī jaḍī re lol,
Rangī Pramukh rang chundaḍī re lol;
Gnān shīkhyānu dūr paḍyu ājthī re lol,
Dhaṇīe chhoḍāvī kāḷpāshthī re lol... 3
Hu to hete hinḍolā khāṭ hīnchtī re lol,
Swāmīne khoḷale hu kheltī re lol;
Jagat mayānī bīk tajī mhāltī re lol,
Preme Pramukh charaṇ sevtī re lol... 4
Māre antar amrut ras ūbhare re lol,
Manḍu shīd ghens hānḍle fare re lol;
Hu to khelu Akshar kere āngaṇe re lol,
Chhalke sukh sāgar ā same re lol... 5
title: Māre āngaṇ sonāno sūraj ūgiyo re lol

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1029: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
